encrypt

public final ElGamalEncryption encrypt(java.math.BigInteger m,
                                       java.math.BigInteger rf)
Encrypt message m in Z_q ***** USE ONLY IF p = 2q+1 *****

Parameters:
m - message to encrypt
rf - random factor to use in the encryption
Returns:
the encrypted message
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if m >= this.q or m < 0

encrypt

public final ElGamalEncryption encrypt(java.math.BigInteger m)
Encrypt message m in Z_q ***** USE ONLY IF p = 2q+1 ***** It uses a random encryption factor in the range [1, q[.

Parameters:
m - message to encrypt
Returns:
the encrypted message
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if m >= this.q or m < 0

Parameters:
m - message to encrypt
Returns:
the encrypted message and the random factor used
Throws:

Parameters:

ElGamalEncryption object containing the message encryption

encodeMessage

private final java.math.BigInteger encodeMessage(java.math.BigInteger m)
Encodes message m in Z_q into an element of the q-order group of Z*_p ***** USE ONLY IF p = 2q+1 *****

Parameters:
m - message to encoded
Throws:
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if m >= q or m < 0

generateRandomFactor

private final java.math.BigInteger generateRandomFactor()
Creates a random factor in [2^bitLength, 2^(bitLength+1)[ (the random factor is always a number of "bitLength" bits) If this.random is not initialized it initialize itself with the default SecureRandom

Returns:
random number in [2^bitLength, 2^(bitLength+1)[

verifyMessageEncryption

public final boolean verifyMessageEncryption(java.math.BigInteger m,
                                             ElGamalVerifiableEncryption ve)
Verifies the encryption of message m in Z_p ***** USE ONLY IF p = 2q+1 *****

Parameters:
m - message
ve - verifiable encryption
Returns:
true if ve is a verifiable encryption of m, and false otherwise

Parameters:
m - message
ve - verifiable encryption
Returns:
